programme.desc: Moving from turtles of the Palawan coast to the unique National Marine Park at Tubbataha, to meet giants, whale sharks and manta rays. We also see how people can mediate between people and wildlife as we join a snake hunting team catching and translocating a deadly Samar cobra.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Wonders
programme.desc: Blanketed by mists and bordered by dense jungles filled with rampaging beasts, Rwanda is a country cloaked in mystery. This tropical land of fire and forest lies at the crest of the mountainous backbone of Africa. Home to the African great apes and some of the continent's most mysterious landscapes - from the Virunga volcanoes, to rich rainforest to exploding lakes.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Wonders
programme.desc: Ethiopia is a wilderness of extremes - from lush lakes to towering peaks - where life has had to adapt in order to survive. This ancient land has cradled life since the dawn of time, and beyond the scorched deserts lie fortified mountains that conceal natural treasure troves of wildlife found nowhere else on Earth.

programme.title: Untamed Philippines
programme.desc: Moving from turtles of the Palawan coast to the unique National Marine Park at Tubbataha, to meet giants, whale sharks and manta rays. We also see how people can mediate between people and wildlife as we join a snake hunting team catching and translocating a deadly Samar cobra.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The bidding is live at the large animal auction! The Pol‚Äôs are working towards their goal of bringing home sheep and cows to their farm. Any animals they win will be delivered to the farm in just three days, so the pressure is on to get the sheep hut finished in time ‚Äì and there is a ton left to do. Meanwhile, Beth and Charles are concerned about the low activity in their beehives.

programme.title: Dr. Oakley, Yukon Vet
programme.desc: A young reindeer with many ailments needs Dr. Oakley's help to get back into fighting shape and an elderly porcupine poses a pokey problem.

programme.title: Dr. Oakley, Yukon Vet
programme.desc: While Dr. Oakley awaits a litter of puppies, she hits the road to treat a stubborn bison, and a moose with a respiratory issue. In the clinic, she checks a Great Dane's swollen leg.

programme.title: Animals Gone Wild
programme.desc: No matter how hard we try to figure them out, animals are just plain unpredictable. From a trespassing bear to a quick-witted sea lion, to a slithering, slippery serpent surprise, it's Mother Nature's most astonishing round up of animal encounters. It's Animals Gone Wild: Bizarre Encounters.

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: A small family of wild dogs is on the run desperately looking for a safe place to raise six, tiny puppies, but the Savage Kingdom will test them to the limit. The sanctuary they seek is filled with rivals who stand in their way and predators who want to eat their puppies. Only the resolve of their dedicated leaders, Teemana and Malao, can save them..

programme.title: Animals Gone Wild
programme.desc: When you take an animals natural instincts and add a trick up its sleeve, the outcome is anything but ordinary. From unruly intruders and escape artists to hot-headed security guards and just plain bad manners, rogues are on the run. These instigators follow their own rules and make no apologies in Animals Gone Wild: Ambushed.

programme.title: Animals Gone Wild
programme.desc: No matter how hard we try to figure them out, animals are just plain unpredictable. From a trespassing bear to a quick-witted sea lion, to a slithering, slippery serpent surprise, it's Mother Nature's most astonishing round up of animal encounters. It's Animals Gone Wild: Bizarre Encounters.

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: A small family of wild dogs is on the run desperately looking for a safe place to raise six, tiny puppies, but the Savage Kingdom will test them to the limit. The sanctuary they seek is filled with rivals who stand in their way and predators who want to eat their puppies. Only the resolve of their dedicated leaders, Teemana and Malao, can save them..

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: Not all lions in the Savage Kingdom are born equal while the Marsh Pride dominates the beating heart of the realm, the three lionesses of the Northern Pride struggle to hold their ground in the forests and hills. Once a great pride, their sons have been banished, and if they can't rebuild their pride they face hunger, exile or worse..

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: Matsumi, has ascended to become Queen of the Marsh Pride. An unrivalled hunter, she has yet to prove herself as the leader of the dynasty that controls the beating heart of her Savage Kingdom the Great Marsh. Her rivals and The Kingdoms brutal climate do everything they can to bring her clan to its knees. Will the price of success be too high for the Marsh Pride to pay?.

programme.title: Animals Gone Wild
programme.desc: When you take an animals natural instincts and add a trick up its sleeve, the outcome is anything but ordinary. From unruly intruders and escape artists to hot-headed security guards and just plain bad manners, rogues are on the run. These instigators follow their own rules and make no apologies in Animals Gone Wild: Ambushed.

programme.title: Animals Gone Wild
programme.desc: How outrageous can the animal kingdom get? Whether its out-of-bounds behavior or savage instincts run amok, when animals act out, theyre a force to be reckoned with. From the mysterious depths of the deep blue sea to the jungles untamed edge, see just how rough, rowdy, and lawless Mother Natures most unruly creatures can be.

programme.title: Animals Gone Wild
programme.desc: When your number's up, it's up. Or is it? When fight or flight instincts kick in, anything is possible, and animals will do anything to survive. From heroic acts of bravery to narrow escapes and near misses, expect the unexpected when creatures big and small encounter the animal kingdom's strangest curve balls in Animals Gone Wild: Shock & Awe.

programme.title: Animals Gone Wild
programme.desc: From the deepest seas to the tallest mountains, animals continuously surprise us and prove yet again that when it comes to Mother Nature, there is always an exception to the rule. These animals go against the grain, whether cheating death or forming odd friendships- it's Animals Gone Wild: Surprisingly Human. .

programme.title: Animals Gone Wild
programme.desc: No matter how hard we try to figure them out, animals are just plain unpredictable. From a trespassing bear to a quick-witted sea lion, to a slithering, slippery serpent surprise, it's Mother Nature's most astonishing round up of animal encounters. It's Animals Gone Wild: Bizarre Encounters.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: The staffers become the clients as they bring in their pets for the vets to treat. Dr. Pol builds a special cast for an injured calf, Dr. Lisa chases a pair of goats, and Dr. Brenda has to change her plans when a reindeers symptoms suddenly change. With a goose, bunny, and pregnant pup all at the clinic, the staff works hard keeping Pol Vet running smoothly. .

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Surprises come in all scrapes and sizes. A cockatiel has a tweaked beak and Dr. Lisa ponders a barn cats bladder leak. When a Chihuahua arrives after hours with an eye emergency, Doc remains focused. A serious blemish surfaces on a show dog and a hoarse horse struggles to breathe. Everyone comes together to make Dianes birthday extra special.

programme.title: Land Of The Iberian Lynx
programme.desc: Sierra Morena is a mountain range of climatic extremes. The harsh winter puts the lynxes of the Jandula River Valley to the test. Golden eagles, otters, wild boars and cormorants struggle to survive in the land of the Iberian lynx.

programme.title: Land Of The Iberian Lynx
programme.desc: Spring rains bring new opportunities and hope to the land of the Iberian lynx. But for the female lynxes of the valley, it is always a challenge to raise their cubs. The series follows the lynxes in their struggle for survival, from the thrill of the hunt to the tender moments of parenting, and also witnesses their coexistence with other animals like majestic golden eagles or powerful deer.
